name: Greek Salad
description: Fresh Mediterranean salad with crispy lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, olives, and feta cheese, dressed with olive oil and oregano.

name: Bruschetta
description: Grilled bread rubbed with garlic, topped with diced tomatoes, fresh basil, and extra virgin olive oil.

name: Lemon Dessert
description: A tangy and sweet lemon cake with a light, fluffy texture and a refreshing citrus glaze.

name: Mediterranean Pasta
description: Al dente pasta tossed with sun-dried tomatoes, olives, artichokes, and feta cheese in a light olive oil sauce.

name: Hummus Plate
description: Creamy chickpea dip served with warm pita bread, olive oil, and a sprinkle of paprika.

name: Grilled Salmon
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection, served with a lemon-dill sauce and seasonal vegetables.

name: Tiramisu
description: Classic Italian dessert made with layers of coffee-soaked ladyfingers and mascarpone cream, dusted with cocoa powder.

name: Lamb Gyro
description: Tender slices of seasoned lamb wrapped in warm pita bread with tomatoes, onions, and tzatziki sauce.

name: Spanakopita
description: Flaky phyllo pastry filled with spinach, feta cheese, onions, and herbs, baked until golden brown.

name: Baklava
description: Sweet dessert made with layers of phyllo pastry, filled with chopped nuts and sweetened with honey or syrup.

name: Calamari Fritti
description: Tender squid rings lightly battered and fried to a golden crisp, served with lemon aioli.

name: Moussaka
description: Traditional Greek casserole with layers of eggplant, potatoes, seasoned ground lamb, and béchamel sauce.

name: Sangria
description: Refreshing wine punch with fresh fruit, brandy, and a hint of sweetness.

name: Chef's Special Seafood Paella
description: Saffron-infused rice with a medley of seafood, including shrimp, mussels, clams, and fish, with bell peppers and peas.

name: Fresh Lemonade
description: Housemade lemonade with fresh lemon juice, sugar, and a sprig of mint.

name: Mediterranean Lamb Chops
description: Grilled lamb chops marinated in herbs and olive oil, served with roasted potatoes and tzatziki.

name: Falafel Plate
description: Crispy chickpea fritters served with tahini sauce, pita bread, and a fresh Mediterranean salad.

name: Chicken Souvlaki
description: Skewered chunks of marinated chicken, grilled and served with pita, tzatziki, and a Greek salad.

name: Greek Yogurt with Honey
description: Creamy Greek yogurt topped with local honey, walnuts, and fresh berries.

name: Turkish Coffee
description: Rich, unfiltered coffee prepared in a traditional cezve, served with a small sweet treat.

name: Stuffed Grape Leaves
description: Vine leaves stuffed with a savory mix of rice, pine nuts, and herbs, served with lemon wedges.

name: Seafood Risotto
description: Creamy Arborio rice with shrimp, scallops, and fresh herbs, finished with parmesan cheese.

name: Anniversary Special: Lobster Linguine
description: Linguine pasta with succulent lobster in a rich tomato and white wine sauce with a touch of cream.

name: Mediterranean Mezze Platter
description: A selection of small dishes including hummus, baba ganoush, tabbouleh, olives, and warm pita bread.

name: Ratatouille
description: Traditional French Provençal vegetable stew with eggplant, zucchini, bell peppers, and tomatoes.

name: Orange Blossom Cake
description: Moist cake infused with orange blossom water, topped with a light citrus glaze and pistachios.

name: Mint Tea
description: Traditional Moroccan-style tea with fresh mint leaves and a hint of sweetness.

name: Beef Kebab
description: Tender pieces of marinated beef, skewered and grilled with vegetables, served with rice pilaf.

name: Saganaki
description: Greek fried cheese, flambéed tableside with a squeeze of lemon juice.

name: Seasonal Fruit Tart
description: Buttery pastry crust filled with custard and topped with fresh seasonal fruits.

name: Red Wine Sangria Pitcher
description: A refreshing pitcher of sangria made with red wine, brandy, and fresh seasonal fruits.

name: Mushroom Risotto
description: Creamy Arborio rice with a variety of wild mushrooms, finished with parmesan and truffle oil.

name: Roasted Beet Salad
description: Roasted beets with arugula, goat cheese, walnuts, and a balsamic vinaigrette.

name: Pistachio Gelato
description: Homemade Italian-style ice cream made with roasted pistachios and a touch of honey.

name: Limoncello
description: Traditional Italian lemon liqueur, served ice cold as a digestif.

name: Vegetable Tagine
description: Moroccan-style vegetable stew with aromatic spices, served with couscous.

name: Tzatziki
description: Refreshing yogurt dip with cucumber, garlic, and dill, served with warm pita bread.

name: Chocolate Olive Oil Cake
description: Rich, moist chocolate cake made with extra virgin olive oil and a hint of sea salt.

name: Prosecco
description: Crisp Italian sparkling wine, perfect for celebrations or as an aperitif.

name: Summer Special: Grilled Whole Sea Bass
description: Fresh whole sea bass grilled with lemon, herbs, and olive oil, served with seasonal vegetables.

name: Tomato Basil Soup
description: Creamy tomato soup with fresh basil and a drizzle of olive oil, served with crusty bread.

name: Eggplant Parmesan
description: Layers of breaded eggplant, tomato sauce, and cheese, baked until bubbly and golden.

name: Cannoli
description: Crisp pastry tubes filled with sweet ricotta cream and chocolate chips, dusted with powdered sugar.

name: Pomegranate Mojito
description: Refreshing cocktail with rum, mint, lime, and pomegranate juice.

name: Grilled Octopus
description: Tender octopus grilled to perfection, served with lemon, olive oil, and herbs.

name: Osso Buco
description: Slow-cooked veal shanks in a rich, aromatic broth with vegetables, served with gremolata.

name: Fig and Almond Tart
description: Buttery crust filled with almond cream and topped with fresh figs and honey.

name: Mediterranean Iced Tea
description: Refreshing tea infused with orange blossom water and fresh mint leaves.

name: Chef's Weekly Special: Truffle Risotto
description: Creamy risotto with seasonal truffles, finished with aged parmesan and truffle oil.

name: Saffron Paella
description: Traditional Spanish rice dish with saffron, chicken, chorizo, and seafood, cooked in a wide, shallow pan.
